name: security-and-tests

on:
  pull_request:
  push:
    branches: [ main, feature/**, Featpromtail+loki ]

jobs:
  tests:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with: { python-version: '3.11' }
      - name: Install deps
        run: |
          pip install -r lab2-rag/api/requirements.txt pytest
      - name: Run tests
        run: pytest -q

  sbom:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - name: Generate SBOM (syft)
        uses: anchore/sbom-action@v0
        with:
          path: .
          format: spdx-json
          output-file: sbom.spdx.json
